DOC.brief_summary: This study assess bioequivalence ( BE ) Lesinurad/Allopurinol Fixed-Dose Combination ( FDC ) Tablets Coadministered Lesinurad Allopurinol Tablets Fed Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The study assess BE lesinurad/allopurinol 200/300 FDC tablet coadministered lesinurad allopurinol tablet feed state .
DOC.criteria: Subject body mass index range 18 kg/m2 30 kg/m2 . Screening serum urate level â‰¤ 7.0 mg/dL . Asian subject positive test HLAB*5801 allele . History suspicion kidney stone . Estimated creatinine clearance , determine Screening , < 90 mL/min calculate CockcroftGault formula use ideal body weight . Undergone major surgery within 3 month prior Screening . Donated blood experience significant blood loss ( > 450 mL ) within 12 week prior Day 1or give plasma donation within 4 week prior Day 1 . Inadequate venous access unsuitable vein repeat venipuncture . Received strong moderate enzymeinducing drug product within 2 month prior Screening
